name: leed
description: Leed is a lightweight RSS feed aggregator that can be self-hosted, offering a minimal web interface to subscribe, read, and categorize feeds. It stores articles locally and supports plug-ins for additional functionality.

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Minimal interface, Fast performance, Low resource usage. Simple and efficient RSS reader

features.title: Plugin System
features.description: Extend functionality, Custom features, Community add-ons. Customize your reading experience

features.title: Article Management
features.description: Mark as read, Favorites, Archive. Organize your reading list

features.title: Folder Organization
features.description: Feed folders, Tag system, Custom groups. Structure your content sources

features.title: Offline Mode
features.description: Local storage, Cached articles, No internet needed. Read anywhere

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Full-text search, Filter articles, Quick find. Locate content easily

features.title: Database Backup
features.description: OPML support, Backup feeds, Migration tools. Portable feed management
